history.details: Auto mode session started. Scope: phase 1 (4 tickets). Max tickets: 10. Max hours: 8.

Auto mode session started. Scope: phase 2 (3 tickets: ORCH-005, ORCH-006, ORCH-007). Max tickets: 10. Max hours: 8.
ORCH-005: Agent Registry -- registration and capability declaration. PR #31 merged (squash). 40 new tests, 243 total passing, 95% coverage.
ORCH-006: Agent health checking and status monitoring. PR #32 merged (squash). 28 new tests, 271 total passing, 91% coverage.
ORCH-007: Agent configuration file and dynamic loading. PR #33 merged (squash). 36 new tests, 307 total passing, 90% coverage.
Phase 2: Agent Registry -- COMPLETE. 3/3 tickets done. PRs #31-33 merged.

Auto mode session started. Scope: phase 2b + phase 3 (5 tickets: ORCH-026, ORCH-028, ORCH-008, ORCH-009, ORCH-027). Max tickets: 10. Max hours: 8.

ORCH-026: Add FastAPI HTTP server layer alongside FastMCP. PR #37 merged (squash). http_server.py with create_app() factory, CORS middleware, api/routes.py with 3 endpoints. 23 new tests (330 total passing). Steps skipped: validate, test, monitor.

ORCH-028: Implement GET /api/health and GET /api/agents/status endpoints. PR #38 merged (squash). Enhanced routes.py with force_check, agent detail and health endpoints. 8 new tests (338 total passing). Steps skipped: validate, test, monitor.

ORCH-008: Task Router -- domain-based routing engine. PR #39 merged (squash). router.py with 4-method routing (explicit>rules>domain>capability), default rules for 6 ITOM domains, route_task MCP tool. 38 new tests (376 total passing). Steps skipped: validate, test, monitor.

ORCH-009: Task execution and result handling. PR #40 merged (squash). executor.py with dispatch lifecycle, timeout, exponential backoff retry, pluggable handlers, execution history. get_execution_history MCP tool. 22 new tests (398 total passing). Steps skipped: validate, test, monitor.

ORCH-027: Implement POST /api/chat endpoint for message routing. PR #41 merged (squash). api/chat.py with ChatRequest/ChatResponse, process_chat_message. POST /api/chat in routes.py with 400/502/504 error handling. 17 new tests (415 total passing). Steps skipped: validate, test, monitor.
Phase 2b: HTTP API Layer -- COMPLETE. 3/3 tickets done. PRs #37, #38, #41 merged. FastAPI server with health, agents, and chat endpoints operational.

Auto mode session ended. Reason: scope_exhausted. Duration: ~1h. Completed: 5 tickets (12 total across sessions). Skipped: 0. PRs merged: #37, #38, #39, #40, #41. Phase 2b complete (100%). Phase 3 at 67% (2/3). 108 new tests (415 total). Report: .agent-forge/reports/auto-session-20260213-190000.md
